entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI - Firm 1998. Operation and prospects of medium and big companies in Hungary.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-D62: TÁRKI - Firm 1998. Operation and prospects of medium and big companies in Hungary.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Tóth, István János
entry.dcterms:description: ownership, employment, rentability, production, operation, export turnover, import-needs, delivery and invoicing discipline, taxing, debts
entry.dcterms:subject: economic policy
income, property and savings
business/industrial management and organisation
social stratification and groupings
economic organization
survey data
time-series

A random sample of companies containing the 1500 biggest companies (employing 50 people or more), production companies also exporting their products; sample based on the registry of the Hungarian Central Statistical Office (KSH).
Data collection with questionnaire, administered by interviewers, and self-administered questionnaires.
B
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
entry.dcterms:subject: SPSS portable datafile
